SELECT a.RPC_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT ,a.RPC_VHC_ID ,a.REP_ROUT_ID ,a.ALLOC_NO ,a.COR_ID ,a.INCDNT_ID ,a.GRP_VHC_ID ,a.GRP_VHC_NO ,a.GRP_DRV_ID ,a.GRP_DRV_NM ,a.RPC_VHC_NO ,a.RPC_DRV_ID ,a.RPC_DRV_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.RPC_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS RPC_DTM ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.TM_X ,a.TM_Y ,a.DETAILS ,a.ROUT_ID ,b.INCDNT_TYPE ,c.REP_ROUT_NM ,d.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_RPC_VHC_INFO a LEFT JOIN BRT_INCDNT_INFO b ON a.OPER_DT = b.OPER_DT AND a.GRP_VHC_ID = b.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST c ON a.REP_ROUT_ID = c.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST d ON a.ROUT_ID = d.ROUT_ID
AND OCR_DTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || RPC_VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND OCR_DTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND RPC_VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY OCR_DTM
select DATE_FORMAT(OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OCR_DTM, RPC_VHC_ID from BRT_RPC_VHC_INFO
select DATE_FORMAT(OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT, GRP_VHC_ID from BRT_RPC_VHC_INFO

SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.DRV_ID ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,B.DRV_NM FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_DRV_MST B ON A.DRV_ID = B.DRV_ID
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY A.VHC_ID

SELECT DRV_ID ,DRV_NM FROM BMS_DRV_MST
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DRV_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY DRV_ID

SELECT VHC_ID ,VHC_NO FROM BMS_VHC_MST
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY VHC_ID

SELECT A.INCDNT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(A.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.REP_ROUT_NM ,A.VHC_ID ,A.DRV_ID ,A.INCDNT_TYPE ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_NM ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.VHC_NO ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,B.DRV_NM FROM BRT_INCDNT_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_DRV_MST B ON A.DRV_ID = B.DRV_ID
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY INCDNT_ID DESC
